attributes.name: emergencyStop

destroy().details: Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

params._stop: Switch the circuit breaker on or off

params._index: The index of the image to return

getImage(address,uint8).return: _ipfsHash The IPFS hash_title The image title_description The image description_tags image Then image tags_uploadedOn The uploaded timestamp

getImageCount(address).return: The number of images associated with a given address

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

emergencyStop(bool).notice: Pause the contract.  It stops execution if certain conditions are met and can be useful  when new errors are discovered.

getImage(address,uint8).notice: Returns the image at index in the ownership array

getImageCount(address).notice: Returns the number of images associated with the given address

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

uploadImage(string,string,string,string).notice: associate an image entry with the owner i.e. sender address
